CustomField.description: Allows the user to give a short description of how the wage assessment is derived. Can be used on output documents for descriptive purposes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe how the assessment is derived in terms that will be displayed on output documents. Use a ~ around a variable to display its value and use {} around a formula to be calculated. Ex. "Number of employees (~A~) X Number of Days (~B~) = {~A~*~B~}
CustomField.label: Wage Assessment Description
